response.overview: So Solid Crew are the most exciting act to emerge onto the British music scene for decades. Portrayed as a threat to the nation’s youth by much of the media and many of those in authority, the group are effectively banned from playing live anywhere in the UK. This Is So Solid is all you need to bring you up to speed with the phenomenon that is So Solid Crew at the end of 2002. Containing the promo videos to all their singles, David Upshal’s revealing documentary 'This Is So Solid' and exclusive footage from a fan club only live show where the crew unveil brand new tracks, this DVD gives a unique insight into the crew’s music, personalities and performance.
response.title: This Is So Solid
